channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Powerful US storm threatens to create a blizzard, tornadoes and fires
item.description: Powerful storms have killed two people in Mississippi, torn the roofs off an apartment building and a nursing home in Oklahoma and threatened communities across the nation.

item.title: Despite weather concerns, New Orleans celebrates Mardi Gras Day and bids farewell to Carnival season
Senate panel questions Trump nominee to lead National Institutes of Health
